title: Self-Management Workshop for Benzodiazepine Tapering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with medication administration and general understanding of self-management
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals but have novice-level knowledge regarding benzodiazepine tapering. Smartphones are the primary technological environment; learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the stepwise procedure for benzodiazepine tapering within 4 weeks
Learners can reduce dosage by 10% or more using self-monitoring tools
Learners can execute three strategies to manage anxiety symptoms during medication tapering

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
